sourcesContent:
import "./post.css" import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons" import { Users} from '../../dummyData' import { useState } from "react" export default function Post({post}) { const [like,setLike] = useState(post.like) const [isLiked,setIsLiked] = useState(false) const PF = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER; const likeHandler= ()=>{ //如果有喜歡過的話就扣一沒有喜歡過則是加一 setLike(isLiked ? like-1: like+1) setIsLiked(!isLiked) } return (
u.id===post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className="postProfileImg" /> {Users.filter((u)=>u.id===post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{like}個喜歡
{post.comment}個評論
) }
